pitt.search.semanticvectors.orthography

Class NumberRepresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • pitt.search.semanticvectors.orthography.NumberRepresentation

  • public class NumberRepresentation
extends Object
    Class that generates sequences of evenly distributed vectors to represent numbers between two given end points.
    Author:
    Manuel Wahle, Trevor Cohen, some cleanup by Dominic Widdows

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NumberRepresentation(FlagConfig flagConfig)
      This constructor allows for the generation of sets of number vectors, using a standard random seed
      NumberRepresentation(FlagConfig flagConfig, String startSeed, String endSeed)
      Initializes an instance of NumberRepresentation with its start and end vectors, checking that these demarcator vectors are not too close together.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VectorStoreRAM getNumberVectors(int iStart, int iEnd)
      Gets a sequence of number vectors, the first and last of which are the demarcator vectors, and the intervening members being evenly linearly distributed between these.
      static void main(String[] args)
      Deprecated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NumberRepresentation

        public NumberRepresentation(FlagConfig flagConfig,
                    String startSeed,
                    String endSeed)
        Initializes an instance of NumberRepresentation with its start and end vectors, checking that these demarcator vectors are not too close together. Allows for the specification of a start and end seed, so mutually near-orthogonal sets of demarcator vectors can be created
        Parameters:
        flagConfig - Flag configuration, used in particular to control vectortype and dimension.

      • NumberRepresentation

        public NumberRepresentation(FlagConfig flagConfig)
        This constructor allows for the generation of sets of number vectors, using a standard random seed
        Parameters:
        flagConfig -

    • Method Detail

      • main

        @Deprecated
public static void main(String[] args)
        Deprecated. 

      • getNumberVectors

        public VectorStoreRAM getNumberVectors(int iStart,
                              int iEnd)
        Gets a sequence of number vectors, the first and last of which are the demarcator vectors, and the intervening members being evenly linearly distributed between these.
        Parameters:
        iStart - The number represented by the beginning of the returned sequence.
        iEnd - The number represented by the end of the returned sequence.
        Returns:
        VectorStore in memory whose keys are the integers between iStart and iEnd and whose values are appropriate linear combinations of the demarcator vectors.
